hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.description: Let's collaborate on your next project. We're always excited to explore new possibilities and create meaningful experiences together.

form.title: Send us a message
form.description: Tell us about your project or idea. We'll get back to you within 48 hours.

questions.question: What types of projects do you take on?
questions.answer: We specialize in interactive experiences, custom hardware solutions, and design consultancy. Our projects range from cozy games to innovative physical interfaces.

questions.question: What is your typical project timeline?
questions.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity. We'll provide a detailed timeline estimate after our initial consultation.

questions.question: Do you work with international clients?
questions.answer: Yes, we work with clients globally and have experience managing remote collaborations effectively.
